mapper.select:
SELECT gi.gateway_cycle gateway_cycle, a.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID mkt_campaign_id, a.mkt_campaign_name mkt_campaign_name, h.CONTENT_TPL_ID content_tpl_id, m.script_name script_name, me.event_code event_code, IFNULL(gi.send_sms_total,0) send_sms_total, IFNULL(gi.gateway_succ_commit,0) gateway_succ_commit, IFNULL(gi.success_send,0) success_send, CONCAT(IF(ROUND(IFNULL(gi.success_send,0)/IFNULL(gi.gateway_succ_commit,0)*100,2)=100,100,ROUND(IFNULL(gi.success_send,0)/IFNULL(gi.gateway_succ_commit,0)*100,2)),'%') success_send_ratio FROM mkt_campaign a LEFT JOIN strategy_comp_inst g ON a.mkt_campaign_id = g.activity_id LEFT JOIN strategy_comp_recom_info h ON g.comp_inst_id = h.comp_inst_id INNER JOIN g_itm_remind_send_d gi ON gi.act_id=h.CONTENT_TPL_ID INNER JOIN mkt_script m ON m.CONTENT_TPL_ID = h.CONTENT_TPL_ID INNER JOIN MKT_CAM_EVT_REL me ON a.mkt_campaign_id=me.mkt_campaign_id
and gi.gateway_cycle=#{gateway_cycle} and a.mkt_campaign_name=#{mkt_campaign_name} and m.script_name=#{script_name}
